lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Steve Mac/Ed Sheeran
[00:00.630] 作词 : Steve Mac/Ed Sheeran
[00:01.892]No one knows about the things
[00:02.860]That I've been through with you
[00:05.682]There were times I'd drive you nearly mental
[00:09.620]But when your mad, you are still beautiful
[00:17.573]And I know that I'm punchin' way above
[00:21.546]So lucky that we fell in love
[00:25.395]Sometimes I wonder am I enough?
[00:30.419]Cause you could have someone without a belly or a temper
[00:35.817]Perfect teeth, hair growing where it’s meant to
[00:39.567]You know my lips are all that I can hold against you
[00:43.366]This is all I'll ever need, you and I
[00:47.859]Hello My Love
[00:50.819]I’ve been searching for someone like you
[00:55.639]For most my life
[00:58.785]Happiness ain’t a thing I’m used to
[01:03.297]You could've fallen hard for anyone
[01:07.144]Plenty of fish in sea, hey now
[01:11.435]For all of time, now I know
[01:15.035]It's just my angel and me
[01:20.563]No one know about all the good things you do
[01:24.425]When people take advantage of you
[01:28.359]Your heart is pure and so beautiful
[01:36.287]And I know that it's just the way you are
[01:40.327]Father's eyes but mother's daughter
[01:44.240]And you tell me that you don't give enough
[01:49.259]And now I found someone with all the boxes I want ticked
[01:54.637]Cause your love is all I ever wanted
[01:58.656]Set my heart on fire, I needed something
[02:02.160]This is all I wanted to be, you and I
[02:06.561]Hello My Love
[02:09.444]I’ve been searching for someone like you
[02:14.227]For most of my life
[02:17.438]Happiness ain’t a thing I’m used to
[02:22.091]You could've fallen hard for anyone
[02:25.709]Plenty of fish in sea, hey now
[02:30.146]For all of time, now I know
[02:33.407]It's just my angel and me
[02:36.462]Cause you could have someone without a belly or a temper
[02:41.822]Perfect teeth, hair growing where it’s meant to
[02:45.611]You know my lips are all that I can hold against you
[02:49.327]This is all I'll ever need
[02:52.416]You and I
[02:54.335]You and I
[02:55.726]Hello My Love
[02:58.784]I’ve been searching for someone like you
[03:03.531]For most of my life
[03:06.330]Happiness ain’t a thing I’m used to
[03:11.316]You could've fallen hard for anyone
[03:15.047]Plenty of fish in sea, hey now
[03:19.375]For all of time, now I know
[03:22.938]It's just my angel and me
tlyric:
[00:01.892]不曾有人知道
[00:02.860]我们过去的经历
[00:05.682]曾经 我也让你歇斯底里
[00:09.620]可生气时的你 却还是那样美丽
[00:17.573]我知道我还不够好
[00:21.546]还好你还爱着我
[00:25.395]有时我想 我是否做得足够
[00:30.419]你本值得一个更完美的人
[00:35.817]他的外表也许万里挑一
[00:39.567]而我的吻 却让你留在我怀里
[00:43.366]我想要的 只有你
[00:47.859]你好啊 我的爱人
[00:50.819]为了寻找你
[00:55.639]我用了一生的光阴
[00:58.785]还未来得及回味这甜蜜
[01:03.297]你本可以爱上任何一个人
[01:07.144]如同大海的里的游鱼
[01:11.435]如今我知道 这辈子
[01:15.035]是我的天使 和我在一起
[01:20.563]没人曾注意到善良的你
[01:24.425]他们只会利用你的善意
[01:28.359]你的心灵是那样纯洁美丽
[01:36.287]纯真善良 就是你的天性
[01:40.327]你是爸爸妈妈的骄傲
[01:44.240]却告诉我 你做得还不够
[01:49.259]如今我知道 你是我的命中注定
[01:54.637]你的爱 就是我的毕生所需
[01:58.656]我需要你 点燃我的心房
[02:02.160]我想要的人 只有你
[02:06.561]你好啊 我的爱人
[02:09.444]为了寻找你
[02:14.227]我用了一生的光阴
[02:17.438]还未来得及回味这甜蜜
[02:22.091]你本可以爱上任何一个人
[02:25.709]如同大海的里的游鱼
[02:30.146]如今我知道 这辈子
[02:33.407]是我的天使 和我在一起
[02:36.462]你本值得一个更完美的人
[02:41.822]他的外表也许万里挑一
[02:45.611]我的吻 让你留在我怀里
[02:49.327]我想要的 只有你
[02:52.416]只有你
[02:54.335]只有你
[02:55.726]你好啊 我的爱人
[02:58.784]为了寻找你
[03:03.531]我用了一生的光阴
[03:06.330]还未来得及回味这甜蜜
[03:11.316]你本可以爱上任何一个人
[03:15.047]如同大海的里的游鱼
[03:19.375]如今我知道 这辈子
[03:22.938]是我的天使 和我在一起
